name: What is Cloud Computing
description: Cloud computing is the foundation of modern infrastructure. Learn about IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, and different service models.

learning_steps.title: What is Cloud Computing
learning_steps.description: Learn about IaaS, PaaS, SaaS and the different service models that make up cloud computing.

learning_steps.title: IaaS vs PaaS vs SaaS
learning_steps.description: Dive deeper into the three main cloud service models and when to use each.
The three major cloud providers are AWS (Amazon), Azure (Microsoft), and GCP (Google). You'll choose one to focus on throughout this guide, but the concepts you learn apply to all of them.

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what cloud computing is and why companies use it?
Can you quiz me on the differences between IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS with examples?
Can you ask me to name the major cloud providers and one service each offers?

checklist.text: I understand what cloud computing is
I know the difference between IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS
I'm aware of the major cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP)
